sourcesContent:
import { Component } from '@angular/core'; import { UserService } from '../user.service'; @Component({ selector: 'app-login', templateUrl: './login.component.html', styleUrls: ['./login.component.css'] }) export class LoginComponent { constructor(private userService: UserService){ } login(email: string, password: string) : void { this.userService.login(); } }

Login Form

Email is required!

Have an account? Register
